raw_text: RANJITHA – J.V. (RANJITH) DIAS – Dearly beloved husband of Nirmala,​ loving and devoted father of Nishanthi and Ramindra,​ father-in-law of Nalaka,​ darling grandfather of Anaaya,​ Devain and Kayen,​ brother of Sunethra and late Irani,​ brother-in-law of Daya Tissera,​ Keerthi Peiris,​ Malcom and Jayanthi Dias,​ Shayama and Lakshman Gunawardena,​ Dinoo and Susiri Jayawardena,​ loving son of late Percy and late Mebel Dias and son-in-law of late Allen and late Pearl Dias. Remains lie at 873,​ Negombo Road,​ Mabola,​ Wattala followed by burial at Our Lady of Good Health Church,​ Mabola on Tuesday 10th October 2023.064356

SIRIWARDHANE – KAMAL – Beloved husband of Janaki (nee Senanayake),​ father of Thisali and Shanil,​ brother of Harsha (UK) and Ramani. Remains will lie at “The Restpect”,​ Borella on 8th October from 6.00 p.m. onwards. Cortege leaves the parlour on 9th October 2023 at 4.45 p.m. for cremation at the New Crematorium,​ Borella.064355
